svg:
<line x1='250' y1='250' x2='350' y2='250 stroke='#000' stroke-width='1'>
Turtle { position: Point { x: 350, y: 250 }, bearing: 0, pen: Pen { thickness: 1, color: "#000", down: true } }
Turtle { position: Point { x: 350, y: 250 }, bearing: 0, pen: Pen { thickness: 3, color: "#000", down: true } }
<line x1='350' y1='250' x2='370' y2='250 stroke='#000' stroke-width='3'>
Turtle { position: Point { x: 370, y: 250 }, bearing: 0, pen: Pen { thickness: 3, color: "#000", down: true } }
Turtle { position: Point { x: 370, y: 250 }, bearing: 0, pen: Pen { thickness: 3, color: "#ff0000", down: true } }
<line x1='370' y1='250' x2='400' y2='250 stroke='#ff0000' stroke-width='3'>
Turtle { position: Point { x: 400, y: 250 }, bearing: 0, pen: Pen { thickness: 3, color: "#ff0000", down: true } }
